content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, nice to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment in Munich. The apartment is 25 square meters in size and is located in a prime location. I am sure you will find it to be a great place to live. In terms of the rental price, I am open to negotiating with you. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I don't have much money. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
I understand. As a landlord, I want to maximize my gains and make sure that I am getting a fair price for my property. However, I am also willing to be reasonable and work with you to find a price that works for both of us.

Based on the location and size of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price is fair and competitive, and it should be within your budget as a student. I hope we can come to an agreement on this price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Great to hear that you agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement, please do not hesitate to let me know. I will be happy to assist you.

Once you have signed the lease agreement, you can move in and start enjoying your new home in Munich. I am sure you will find it to be a great place to live, and I look forward to being your landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
